name: Rapidsoft Systems, Inc.
tag_list: web-2-0, mobile-applications, mobile-software, web-software, qa, testing, server-monitoring, offshore-software-development, software-development-outsourcing, mobile-application-development-outsourcing, j2me-application-outsourcing, iphone-application-outs
overview:
Rapidsoft Systems Inc is a global IT services company with main office in Princeton, NJ USA , US R&D Center in Mercerville NJ and sales, support and devlopment offices in Palo Alto, CA, USA, Singapore, Bombay and New Delhi (India).

Rapidsof offers software development services for e-business, Web 2.0, Mobile and technology applications, product design and implementation, web services applicatios, networking and wireless applications.

They specialize in the following key areas:Custom software development, Product design, Testing, Software maintenance, Opensource Software enhancements, and Turn-key projects.

Rapidsoft Systems offshore software services, custom software development company, offshore software company in India, we create customized software solutions for Web 2.0, mobile applications, Mobile Software, Web software, qa and testing, server monitoring, web development, LAMPs, and .NET Technologies.
